title: Xverse
description: Xverse is the most advanced and user-friendly Bitcoin wallet, supporting Ordinals, Runes, BRC20, Stacks, and Rare Sats. Available on iOS, Android, and as a Chrome browser extension, Xverse enables  secure management of Bitcoin on layer 1 and layer 2 networks like Stacks, with more networks coming soon. Our globally distributed, agile, and fast-moving team is focused on onboarding the next 1 billion users to web3, positioning Xverse as the go-to wallet and gateway.
